ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste

cookingTips: Cut potatoes evenly for uniform cooking in the pouch
Create packets with shiny side of foil facing inward to reflect heat
Carefully open foil packets away from your face—steam will escape
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Are you cooking on a grill or in an oven? This affects heat management for the foil packets.
